question: If I am found ineligible for Medical Assistance (MA), what steps can I take to enroll through Pennie®?
text:
If I am found ineligible for Medical Assistance (MA), what steps can I take to enroll through Pennie?  
          
        
If you think you may not be eligible for MA, we still encourage you to complete and send in your renewal packet. If you complete your renewal for MA and are ineligible, your information will be transferred to Pennie or CHIP. If you are transferred to Pennie, you will receive an eligibility determination notice from along with your account claim notice. If you qualify for financial assistance, this notice will tell you how much financial assistance you are eligible for to reduce the cost of health coverage and care.If your application isnt complete, you will receive an account claiming notice with information about how to complete your Pennie application.

You will have 120 days to enroll in a plan through Pennie from the date on your notice (unless you are shopping for coverage during Pennies Open Enrollment Period, which runs from November 1 to January 15).
